Class SocialNetworkGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • SocialNetworkGraph
  • public class SocialNetworkGraph
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a social network graph with people and their friendships.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      SocialNetworkGraph()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addFriendship​(java.lang.String name1, java.lang.String name2)
      Adds a friendship between two people in the social network.
      void addPerson​(java.lang.String name, int age, java.util.List<java.lang.String> hobbies)
      Adds a person to the social network.
      void countClusters()
      Counts and prints the clusters of people in the social network using BFS.
      java.util.List<Person> findShortestPath​(java.lang.String startName, java.lang.String endName)
      Finds the shortest path between two people in the social network using BFS.
      void removeFriendship​(java.lang.String name1, java.lang.String name2)
      Removes a friendship between two people in the social network.
      void removePerson​(java.lang.String name)
      Removes a person from the social network.
      void suggestFriends​(java.lang.String name, int maxSuggestions)
      Suggests friends for a person based on mutual friends and common hobbies.

      • findShortestPath

        public java.util.List<Person> findShortestPath​(java.lang.String startName,
                                               java.lang.String endName)
        Finds the shortest path between two people in the social network using BFS.
        Parameters:
        startName - the name of the starting person
        endName - the name of the ending person
        Returns:
        a list of people representing the shortest path

      • suggestFriends

        public void suggestFriends​(java.lang.String name,
                           int maxSuggestions)
        Suggests friends for a person based on mutual friends and common hobbies.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the person
        maxSuggestions - the maximum number of friends to suggest
